items.sentence: I never realized that you were interested in Japanese art.
I never realized that you were such a good French speaker.
I often buy bread from the bakery next to the post office.
I had a chance to do that yesterday, but I decided not to.
Tom didn\'t want Mary to find out about what had happened.
Tom dumped the contents of his briefcase out on the table.
Tom ended up not buying the car he was considering buying.
Tom grabbed the rope that was lowered from the helicopter.
Tom says he remembers absolutely nothing about that night.
It\'s important to sleep at least seven hours every night.
